snippet.title: Oasis Blitz - Official Trailer | USC Games Expo
snippet.description: In Oasis Blitz, step into the shoes of Bandit, a daring adventurer armed with the power of drilling. Navigate stunning landscapes with unparalleled fluidity, seamlessly drilling through terrain to conquer obstacles and foes alike. Experience the exhilaration of speed and skill as you restore a lost home, mastering novel traversal and combat mechanics in this fast-paced 3rd person platformer. Oasis Blitz is coming to PC.
